医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
著名神经科学家揭示了大脑回路如何驱动成瘾行为的关键见解在《脑医学》今天发表的一篇全面的基因组新闻采访中，著名神经科学家 Peter Kalivas 博士揭示了关于大脑回路如何驱动成瘾行为的重要见解，并讨论了治疗行为障碍的潜在新药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Renowned-neuroscientist-reveals-key-insights-into-how-brain-Circuits-drive-addictive-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Renowned-neuroscientist-reveals-key-insights-into-how-brain-Circuits-drive-addictive-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc039836-9843-422b-ae6a-a513b3ca7bcd Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:20:34 -0500 Renowned neuroscientist reveals key insights into how brain circuits drive addictive behaviors
新的放射治疗方法可提高老年胶质母细胞瘤患者的生存率梅奥诊所宣布了一种创新治疗方法的结果，该方法可以改善新诊断的胶质母细胞瘤老年患者的总体生存率，同时保持生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-radiation-therapy-approach-improves-survival-for-older-glioblastoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-radiation-therapy-approach-improves-survival-for-older-glioblastoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=097b57a8-2782-400a-8302-577553472fa2 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:16:05 -0500 New radiation therapy approach improves survival for older glioblastoma patients
COVID-19 大流行导致特殊教育识别率大幅下降​COVID-19 大流行对 K-12 教育产生了不利影响，其影响已得到充分记录。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/COVID-19-pandemic-caused-significant-decline-in-special-education-identification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/COVID-19-pandemic-caused-significant-decline-in-special-education-identification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4745319-58c4-41f3-a02f-f319916f730d Tue, 17 Dec 2024 11:07:24 -0500 COVID-19 pandemic caused significant decline in special education identification
科学家研究益生菌在抗生素治疗后恢复肠道微生物群中的作用抗生素是治疗细菌感染的重要临床工具，但我们认识到使用抗生素的一个重要副作用是破坏人类肠道中的微生物群落。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Scientists-examine-probiotics-role-in-restoring-gut-microbiota-after-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Scientists-examine-probiotics-role-in-restoring-gut-microbiota-after-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=007e8910-9146-411b-83ff-f29475a557bd Tue, 17 Dec 2024 10:57:13 -0500 Scientists examine probiotics role in restoring gut microbiota after antibiotics
研究揭示过敏和哮喘患者鼻腔真菌的多样性近四分之一的葡萄牙成年人患有导致流鼻涕的过敏症。这种呼吸道疾病的正式名称为过敏性鼻炎，经常与哮喘相关，是世界各地的一个常见问题，上呼吸道是研究潜在疾病过程的关键目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-nasal-fungi-diversity-in-allergy-and-asthma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Study-reveals-nasal-fungi-diversity-in-allergy-and-asthma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf595e22-9c89-4680-8875-ce91e9700eeb Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:58:51 -0500 Study reveals nasal fungi diversity in allergy and asthma patients
报告强调住房对健康和福祉的影响伦敦大学学院健康公平研究所 (IHE) 今天（12 月 17 日星期二）发布了一份开创性的新报告，强调了住房对健康和福祉的深远影响（包括积极和消极的影响）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Report-highlights-the-impact-of-housing-on-health-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Report-highlights-the-impact-of-housing-on-health-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2196706d-6ecd-4e46-9c5c-f805d8cb201c Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:49:31 -0500 Report highlights the impact of housing on health and wellbeing
对流感保护层理解的突破为新疗法开辟了道路为了对抗引起流感的病毒，科学家们正在探索的途径之一是开发能够破坏其基因组稳定的药物，该基因组由八个 RNA 分子组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-in-understanding-influenzas-protective-coat-opens-path-to-new-treatmen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Breakthrough-in-understanding-influenzas-protective-coat-opens-path-to-new-treatmen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5563bd75-44bc-42e4-b085-d28f5a4fcc55 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:40:00 -0500 Breakthrough in understanding influenza's protective coat opens path to new treatments
保险挑战正在损害获得心理健康服务的机会根据美国心理学会的 2024 年从业者脉搏调查，尽管对心理健康治疗的需求仍然很高，但行政和财务障碍阻碍了许多心理学家参与保险网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Insurance-challenges-are-hurting-access-to-mental-health-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Insurance-challenges-are-hurting-access-to-mental-health-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64087b31-4cc8-4bee-8839-ab9323e1d6ae Tue, 17 Dec 2024 08:26:53 -0500 Insurance challenges are hurting access to mental health services
驾驶职业可能会降低阿尔茨海默病的死亡率一项新的研究提出了一种可能性，即需要频繁空间处理的工作——例如找出出租车路线或导航到医院的最佳方式——可能会降低阿尔茨海默病的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Driving-ocupations-could-lead-to-lower-rates-of-death-from-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/Driving-occupations-could-lead-to-lower-rates-of-death-from-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106e33cb-c7e7-451e-8896-6ebb16b29382 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 07:47:57 -0500 Driving occupations could lead to lower rates of death from Alzheimer's disease
新的血液检测提供了检测心脏移植排斥反应的非侵入性方法血液测试可以显示接受者是否能够耐受新心脏并且不会被排斥。瑞典哥德堡大学的一篇论文表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-blood-test-offers-non-pressive-way-to-detect-heart-transplant-rejection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241217/New-blood-test-offers-non-pressive-way-to-detect-heart-transplant-rejection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b913ca6a-ca2e-4803-ae2f-d5ce603519b2 Tue, 17 Dec 2024 07:02:00 -0500 New blood test offers non-invasive way to detect heart transplant rejection
